trans-unit.source: Provides statistical data for a network interface on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 提供本機電腦上之網路介面的統計資料。

trans-unit.source: This class is used by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetIPv4Statistics%2A> method to return network traffic information for an interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別由<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetIPv4Statistics%2A>方法來傳回網路介面的流量資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceStatistics" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceStatistics" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceStatistics>.
trans-unit.target: 可以呼叫這個建構函式只能由衍生自的<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceStatistics>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes that were received on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 取得介面上所接收的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of bytes that were received on the interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定介面上所接收的位元組總數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes that were sent on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 取得介面上所傳送的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of bytes that were transmitted on the interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定介面上所傳輸的位元組總數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of incoming packets that were discarded.
trans-unit.target: 取得已捨棄的內送封包數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of discarded incoming packets.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定已捨棄的傳入封包總數。

trans-unit.source: This data does not include packets with errors.
trans-unit.target: 這項資料不包含封包，但發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of incoming packets with errors.
trans-unit.target: 取得含有錯誤的傳入封包數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of incoming packets with errors.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定含有錯誤的傳入封包總數。

trans-unit.source: This data does not include packets without errors that were discarded.
trans-unit.target: 這項資料不包含沒有錯誤，已捨棄的封包。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of incoming packets with an unknown protocol that were received on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 取得介面上所接收、具有未知通訊協定的傳入封包數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of incoming packets with an unknown protocol.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定通訊協定不明的傳入封包總數。

trans-unit.source: This data reflects packets that were discarded because the protocol identifier in the packet header was not recognized.
trans-unit.target: 這項資料會反映已捨棄，因為封包標頭中的通訊協定識別碼無法辨認的封包。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of non-unicast packets that were received on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 取得介面上所接收的非單點傳送封包數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of non-unicast packets that were received on the interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定介面上所接收的非單點傳送封包總數。

trans-unit.source: Packets with unicast addresses are delivered to a single interface.
trans-unit.target: 與單點傳播位址的封包將傳遞至單一介面。

trans-unit.source: Packets with non-unicast addresses can be delivered to multiple interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 具有非單點傳播位址的封包可以傳遞給多個介面。

trans-unit.source: Anycast, broadcast, and multicast addresses are types of non-unicast addresses.
trans-unit.target: 任一傳播，廣播和多點傳送的位址是類型的非單點傳播位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of non-unicast packets that were sent on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 取得介面上所傳送的非單點傳送封包數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of non-unicast packets that were sent on the interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定介面上所傳送的非單點傳送封包總數。

trans-unit.source: Packets with unicast addresses are delivered to a single interface.
trans-unit.target: 與單點傳播位址的封包將傳遞至單一介面。

trans-unit.source: Packets with non-unicast addresses can be delivered to multiple interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 具有非單點傳播位址的封包可以傳遞給多個介面。

trans-unit.source: Anycast, broadcast, and multicast addresses are types of non-unicast addresses.
trans-unit.target: 任一傳播，廣播和多點傳送的位址是類型的非單點傳播位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of outgoing packets that were discarded.
trans-unit.target: 取得已捨棄的輸出封包數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of discarded outgoing packets.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定已捨棄的輸出封包總數。

trans-unit.source: This data does not include outgoing packets with errors.
trans-unit.target: 這項資料不包含連出封包，但發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of outgoing packets with errors.
trans-unit.target: 取得含有錯誤的輸出封包數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of outgoing packets with errors.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定含有錯誤的輸出封包總數。

trans-unit.source: This data does not include packets without errors that were discarded.
trans-unit.target: 這項資料不包含沒有錯誤，已捨棄的封包。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the output queue.
trans-unit.target: 取得輸出佇列的長度。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of packets in the output queue.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定輸出佇列中的封包總數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of unicast packets that were received on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 取得介面上所接收的單點傳送封包數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of unicast packets that were received on the interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定介面上所接收的單點傳送封包總數。

trans-unit.source: Packets with unicast addresses are delivered to a single interface.
trans-unit.target: 與單點傳播位址的封包將傳遞至單一介面。

trans-unit.source: Packets with non-unicast addresses can be delivered to multiple interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 具有非單點傳播位址的封包可以傳遞給多個介面。

trans-unit.source: Anycast, broadcast, and multicast addresses are types of non-unicast addresses.
trans-unit.target: 任一傳播，廣播和多點傳送的位址是類型的非單點傳播位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of unicast packets that were sent on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 取得介面上所傳送的單點傳送封包數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of unicast packets that were sent on the interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定介面上所傳送的單點傳送封包總數。

trans-unit.source: Packets with unicast addresses are delivered to a single interface.
trans-unit.target: 與單點傳播位址的封包將傳遞至單一介面。

trans-unit.source: Packets with non-unicast addresses can be delivered to multiple interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 具有非單點傳播位址的封包可以傳遞給多個介面。

trans-unit.source: Anycast, broadcast, and multicast addresses are types of non-unicast addresses.
trans-unit.target: 任一傳播，廣播和多點傳送的位址是類型的非單點傳播位址。
